text: "Dagny" is a song written by Owe Thörnqvist and recorded by him on a 1958 EP.Information at Svensk mediedatabas The song lyrics tell the story of "Dagny", a waitress girl at "Café 7:an". A Lalla Hansson recording charted at 11 weeks between 1 July and 9 September 1973, peaking at second position.Svensktoppen - 1973 The song is also common at sing-along events in Sweden. At Dansbandskampen 2009, the song was recorded by The Playtones and appeared on their 2010 album Rock'n'Roll Dance Party. A heavy metal version was recorded by Flintstens med Stanley. The song is one of the titles in the book Tusen svenska klassiker (2009).Gradvall et al 2009, nr. 31 == References == Category:1958 songs Category:The Playtones songs Category:Lalla Hansson songs Category:Swedish-language songs Category:Swedish songs Category:Songs written by Owe Thörnqvist Category:Metronome Records singles
title: Dagny (song)
